@I_Create_Mayhem @NaNaMoose and @DarthYannious: Try updating your Directx: http://www.microsoft.com/download/en/details.aspx?id=35. 
Also try: Microsoft .NET Framework 4    
http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/en/details.aspx?familyid=9cfb2d51-5ff4-4491-b0e5-b386f32c0992&displaylang=en

http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/en/details.aspx?familyid=a88c6dec-aeae-42cd-a108-d35c013c3b97 

That should fix it.
